<rule id="quarkus-jdbc-mariadb-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>

                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="mariadb-java-client" groupId="org.mariadb.jdbc"/>
                </project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration over="default">
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'mariadb-java-client' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-jdbc-mariadb' extension">
                        <message>
                            Replace the `org.mariadb.jdbc:mariadb-java-client` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-jdbc-mariadb`  
                            Further information in the link below.
                        </message>
                        <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/hibernate-orm" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                    </hint>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
        </rule>
